Accessory Artisan Denign:
You can refine your accessories to make the effects granted by them more powerful. You will need Selenite and Accessory Solvent to refine your accessories.
You can only get Selenite by dissolving an accessory. Keep in mind, though, you won't be able to get it back.
However, when you refine an accessory it retains all of its parameters, so if you decide to revert back to the unrefined form nothing will change. That's how it goes. What can I help you with?
